in_repo.description: Decision-stage runtime matrix for bucket/system profiles via sandbox_runner/wrapper.
Decision-stage adversarial probes (path edges, flow-divert, mach, net).
Golden triples: SBPL ↔ PolicyGraph ↔ runtime outcomes for selected profiles.
Runtime MACF policy registration tracing via DTrace/FBT on a separate runtime host.
Investigates sandbox_init_with_parameters plumbing and __sandbox_ms argument layout.
Swift-based metadata syscalls under sandbox_init to probe metadata canonicalization.
Path alias/canonicalization runtime probes for VFS operations.
Canonical runtime mappings (signatures, coverage, story, traces).
Shared runtime harness, normalization, and mapping tooling.
Apply-gate preflight scanning and enterability indices.
App Sandbox/entitlement probes and sandbox log observation (PolicyWitness).
MACF registration trace scaffolding and structure notes.
